title: Communicating with the Afterlife - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 10/19/17
itunes:title: Communicating with the Afterlife - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 10/19/17
description:
George Noory and researcher Rich Martini discuss his work with psychic mediums to communicate with the spirits of the dead, to convince people that the afterlife is real and how it can give us insights on how to live.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
